tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_publications_metadata (
    publication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    authors TEXT[] NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE NOT NULL,
    journal_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    doi VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE publication_metadata (
  metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_id INT,
  metadata_key TEXT,
  metadata_value TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchPublications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    authors TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    journal VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE PublicationKeywords (
    keyword_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    keyword VARCHAR(100),
    publication_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES ResearchPublications(publication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PublicationRelated (
    related_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_id INT,
    related_publication_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES ResearchPublications(publication_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (related_publication_id) REFERENCES ResearchPublications(publication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  authors VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  abstract TEXT,
  journal VARCHAR(255),
  doi VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE publication_metadata (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  keyword_id INT,
  author_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (publication_id) REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (keyword_id) REFERENCES publication_keywords(keyword_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES publication_authors(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_publications (
  publication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  authors TEXT[],
  publication_date DATE,
  abstract TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE publication_authors (
  author_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  author_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  publication_id INT REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE publication_keywords (
  keyword_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  keyword_text VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  publication_id INT REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE publication_citations (
  citation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  citing_publication_id INT REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id),
  cited_publication_id INT REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE publication_tags (
  tag_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  publication_id INT REFERENCES research_publications(publication_id)
)
